TopicTitle: Can anyone make rings around the kerbin using the editor from better atmospheres v4?

Articles.Content: Yeah, because it would look very cool and wouldnt decrease performance. Dont know about the height of the rings but i would like if they would be similar to saturn ring. If anyone would do it, many people would be greatful.

Yeah, because it would look very cool and wouldnt decrease performance. Dont know about the height of the rings but i would like if they would be similar to saturn ring. If anyone would do it, many people would be greatful.

EVE doesn't support rings yet. It is one of the things I want to add in the next release.
I think you could do that with Planet Factory because it supports rings
